nodes.text: Spaceport Speeders was a speeder shop in Mos Eisley where Luke Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi sold Luke's X-34 landspeeder before meeting with Han Solo and Chewbacca at Docking Bay 94. Most of the speeders available to buy were older and not well-maintained and the proprietor was known for buying his stock at a price far below the speeders' fair market value. For this reason, most of Tatooine's farmers bought and traded their used landspeeders in Anchorhead.
The proprietor of Spaceport Speeders was an Arcona called Unut Poll. Wioslea the Vuvrian and Geordi Hans also worked there.
